Package xdi2.core

The XDI graph model and basic operations on it.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextNode
    This interface represents a context node in an XDI graph.
    Graph
    This interface represents a whole XDI graph.
    GraphFactory
    A graph factory can construct new XDI graph implementations.
    LiteralNode
    This interface represents a literal node in an XDI graph.
    Node  
    Relation
    This interface represents a relation in an XDI graph.
    Statement
    This interface represents a statement in an XDI graph.
    Statement.ContextNodeStatement  
    Statement.LiteralStatement  
    Statement.RelationStatement  

Package xdi2.core Description

The XDI graph model and basic operations on it.
